subject: RE: [junit] Scheduling JUnit
msgSnippet: Or just include it in your ant script so it runs after compilation. Thanks --DP ... From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@clarkware.com] Sent: Monday, June 14, 2004
messageBody:
Or just include it in your ant script so it runs after compilation.


Thanks
--DP

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...]
Sent: Monday, June 14, 2004 1:38 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Scheduling JUnit



On Jun 14, 2004, at 3:08 AM, Sadaf_Choudhry wrote:

> Can Junit tasks be scheduled? without using a Continuous Integration
> tool like CruiseControl or anthill?

Unix 'cron' or Windows 'at' will do the trick.

Mike
